name: Shoon
description:
A side-scrolling shooter made with materials drawn by AI.

All texture materials are straight from Midjourney generated images. I made it in 3 days, so it ends just before the boss battle.

The difficulty is high because it is adjusted for playing by yourself in a short period of time, but it is made so that you can score attack.
There is no ranking function, so if you get a high score, I would be happy if you could write it in the comment section.
